file_content.text: Looks like I picked the right side.
We have heard enough alarms. The time has come to move our base of operations to Loramarr.
Why go to Loramarr when nothing can reach us here? The guards will handle whatever intruder is at the door.
I wonder if you'll be so confident in another minute.
Brave words.
No, they won't.
Your guards couldn't handle an Ortolan in a shock collar.
Your hired help is pathetic.
You see, Undro? Your ego brings nothing but trouble.
I don't know who you think you are, but you made a bad mistake opening this door.
Yeah. You'd better have a million credits for us in a satchel, or it's your hide that will be on the wall.
I owe you nothing but a swift death.
You're all dead.
Tear this fool apart!
I offer refuge for anyone who leaves the White Maw now. All others will die.
Surrender. I'll be merciful.
If that's the case, I accept.
What, no one? I'll accept. This isn't going to end well.
Don't be naive. It's a trick.
Naive is following you and thinking we're going to defeat the Empire.
So be it, traitor.
